translations: v.变皱；起折痕（crease 的 ing 形式）

sentences.translation: 纸板不折一下卷不起来。

sentences.sentence: It was the part about the dermo creasing that really got my attention.
sentences.translation: 这是对真皮的部分，压痕，真的得到了。

sentences.sentence: Scientists will have to come up with new methods of creasing the world's food supply.
sentences.translation: 科学家们将必须提出增加世界粮食供应的新方法。
